content.question: When an economy is at full employment, which of the following will most likely create demand-pull inflation in the short run?

choices.label: An increase in the discount rate
An increase in personal income taxes
A decrease in the real rate of interest
A decrease in the money supply

content.answer: A decrease in the real rate of interest

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
